languages.text: "Священная машина, одержимая ирреальным бесом варпа, предсказывающим будущее... Хитроумное кощунство. Мерзкое, но... изощренное и талантливое".

"A sacred machine possessed by an irreal warp spawn that predicts the future... An ingenious abomination. Such profane calculations are repugnant, but... I cannot deny their sophistication. Impressive."
languages.original_text: "Священная машина, одержимая ирреальным бесом варпа, предсказывающим будущее... Хитроумное кощунство. Мерзкое, но... изощренное и талантливое".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “神圣的机器被虚幻的亚空间恶魔玷污，用来预测未来……多么精巧的可憎之物啊。虽然这种计算程序的亵渎之行令人反感，但是……我不能否认它精密、先进的设计，真是令人印象深刻。”
languages.original_text: "A sacred machine possessed by an irreal warp spawn that predicts the future... An ingenious abomination. Such profane calculations are repugnant, but... I cannot deny their sophistication. Impressive."

traits.locale_text: “神圣的机器被虚幻的亚空间恶魔玷污，用来预测未来……多么精巧的可憎之物啊。虽然这种计算程序的亵渎之行令人反感，但是……我不能否认它精密、先进的设计，真是令人印象深刻。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Une machine sacrée possédée par un rejeton du Warp qui peut prédire l'avenir... Quelle abomination... Ingénieuse, certes, mais néanmoins une abomination. De tels calculs impies me répugnent, mais... je dois avouer qu'ils ne manquent pas de sophistication. Impressionnant. »
languages.original_text: "A sacred machine possessed by an irreal warp spawn that predicts the future... An ingenious abomination. Such profane calculations are repugnant, but... I cannot deny their sophistication. Impressive."

traits.locale_text: « Une machine sacrée possédée par un rejeton du Warp qui peut prédire l'avenir... Quelle abomination... Ingénieuse, certes, mais néanmoins une abomination. De tels calculs impies me répugnent, mais... je dois avouer qu'ils ne manquent pas de sophistication. Impressionnant. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Una máquina sagrada poseída por un engendro irreal de la disformidad capaz de predecir el futuro... Una abominación ingeniosa. Sus cálculos blasfemos son repugnantes, pero... no puedo negar su sofisticación. Es impresionante».
languages.original_text: "A sacred machine possessed by an irreal warp spawn that predicts the future... An ingenious abomination. Such profane calculations are repugnant, but... I cannot deny their sophistication. Impressive."

traits.locale_text: «Una máquina sagrada poseída por un engendro irreal de la disformidad capaz de predecir el futuro... Una abominación ingeniosa. Sus cálculos blasfemos son repugnantes, pero... no puedo negar su sofisticación. Es impresionante».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「非現実の<歪み>の卵にとりつかれた神聖なマシンが未来を予測する…巧みだが唾棄すべき行いだ。こうした不敬な計算は忌まわしい。だが…精巧さは否定できぬ。見事だ」
languages.original_text: "A sacred machine possessed by an irreal warp spawn that predicts the future... An ingenious abomination. Such profane calculations are repugnant, but... I cannot deny their sophistication. Impressive."

traits.locale_text: 「非現実の<歪み>の卵にとりつかれた神聖なマシンが未来を予測する…巧みだが唾棄すべき行いだ。こうした不敬な計算は忌まわしい。だが…精巧さは否定できぬ。見事だ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Eine heilige Maschine, in der ein irreales Warpgezücht haust, welches die Zukunft vorhersagt ... Eine geniale Abscheulichkeit. Solch profane Berechnungen sind abstoßend, doch ... die Raffinesse lässt sich nicht leugnen. Beeindruckend."
languages.original_text: "A sacred machine possessed by an irreal warp spawn that predicts the future... An ingenious abomination. Such profane calculations are repugnant, but... I cannot deny their sophistication. Impressive."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "A sacred machine possessed by an irreal warp spawn that predicts the future... An ingenious abomination. Such profane calculations are repugnant, but... I cannot deny their sophistication. Impressive."

languages.text: "Geleceği gören, gerçek dışı bir öte yaratığının eline düşmüş bir kutsal makine... Ustaca bir garabet. Böyle küfran hesaplamalar tiksinç olmakla birlikte... İleriliklerini inkâr edemem. Etkileyici."
languages.original_text: "A sacred machine possessed by an irreal warp spawn that predicts the future... An ingenious abomination. Such profane calculations are repugnant, but... I cannot deny their sophistication. Impressive."

traits.locale_text: "Geleceği gören, gerçek dışı bir öteboyut yaratığının eline düşmüş bir kutsal makine... Ustaca bir garabet. Böyle küfran hesaplamalar tiksinç olmakla birlikte... İleriliklerini inkâr edemem. Etkileyici."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
